channel.title: Rooneyscape #Oldschool Server
channel.description:
[center] [ul][img]http://www.rooneyscape.com/images/logo.jpg[/img]
[URL=http://rooneyscape.com]RooneyScape [/URL]|| [URL=http://rooneyscape.com/forums]Forums [/URL]|| [URL=http://rooneyscape.com/play.html]CLICK ME TO PLAY[/URL]
[B]Voting[/B]
[URL=http://"http://google.com/top.php?act=detail&sid=6072"]Rune-Server[/URL] || [URL=http://"http://runetoplist.com/page.php?id=432&name=Rooneyscape"]RuneToplist [/URL]|| [URL=http://"http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=rooneyscape.no-ip.biz"]MoparScape[/URL]
Features
[QUOTE] [*]Working woodcutting [*]Amazing oldschool feel [*]No Godswords or any overpowered items [*]Great economy [*]Great Starter base [*]Very straightforward server [*]Working firemaking [*]Working Cooking [*]Working Woodcutting with Stumps [*]Working Runecrafting [*]Working Agility [*]And many more skills [*]No items over 369 [*]Relive that oldschool feeling [*]Working Purple Sweets ! [*]Home teleport no longer requires 1 law rune other teleports do [*]Full 63 waves jad [*]Tz kih now drains prayer [*]Starter pack edited removed 250k and d scimitar [*]D mace bug fixed [*]Dagannoth kings added working great ! [*]Home moved back to Draynor [*]Recipe for disaster soon to be added [*]Elemental workshop soon to be added [*]Dagannoths require a team of 2-3 players [*]Many more updates soon to come ! [*]Cooks Assistant Quest added will post vid soon ! [*]Sailing has been added will post a vid soon ! [*]Creating SplitBark Added ! [b]100% credits to vox[/b] [*]Cracking Wallsafes [*]Weapon Sounds Added [*]Music Added [*]Item animations added ! [/QUOTE]
[B]Media[/B]
Latest Updates
[b]Cracking WallSafes[/b]

item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

well first off, sorry if I am mistaken

isn’t there an advertisement for this already on here? pretty sure there is!

secondly, a piece of advice. please don’t use so many gif’s it makes the page load quite slow and laggy.

besides that looks like a solid advert good luck
